Author: MartinEE
Body:
TERRIBLE service and product quality!

My wife have a pair of Balenciaga "Triple S" shoes that cost EUR 695. 
The shoes has 3 colors and after a walk when it began to rain, the colors was washes into eachother. It has not been possible to remove the colors - neither by professionels or Balenciaga themselves (they didnt even wanna try, which tells me they know how BAD quality their colors are).

We have been writing with Balenciaga many times and waited forever to finaly get this final answer from them:
-------------
"Good afternoon, 

Thank you for your patience while our technical office was analyzing your request. 

Unfortunately, our experts have explained it is not possible to repair the item and bring it back to its originel status. Also, as it is out of warranty, we are not in a position to arrange a return for refund, exchange nor credit note. 

Therefore, we won't be able to go further with your request.

I hope you will understand Balenciaga's position. 

Kind regards...."
---------------

LOL - "I hope you understand Balenciagas position" my @ss. 
Yes, I know your position, Balenciaga: You are CAPITALISTS who gives NO SERVICE whatsoever!

We have bought our LAST Balenciaga products - that is for sure! - and we WARN everyone else about doing byuing Balenciagas products! 

WASTE OF MONEY!
Heading: TERRIBLE service and product quality!

Author: Kwan Ken
Body:
Balenciaga Store does not care about its customer experience!

I purchased a pair of Triple S shoes from the past season (fall/winter 2018 collection) on 16 June 2019 in Singapore at the Balenciaga Store Paragon Orchard. I bought those shoes because the Sales Rep told that there is a 30% discount on this pair past season shoes.

The Sales Rep informed me that the retail price is at $1330 SGD; so I paid 931SGD after the 30% discount. When I got home, I realised that the receipt that I received just stated $931 SGD without specifying the original price of $1330SGD and discount. Also, the price tag on the shoe box itself stated the retail price to be $931SGD. It really seems odd. It seems as if not discount is given at all. All evidences point to the fact that the shoes were just retailing at $931 and I just paid FULL price. Seriously, I felt confused and cheated. I immediately went online to find out more. 

I realised that past season Triple S is priced at 560pounds which is about $962SGD at Mr Porter; and Mr Porter is having a 30% discount just like the Balenciaga Store. This works out to be $674SGD.

I hope that Balenciaga can look into this. I was not expecting this to happen. It will be such an awful experience to feel that Balenciaga marks up the price of its past season shoes and misleads its customers into thinking that they are getting a 30% discount. The fact is that the customer is paying for exactly what its original price is at about $960.
Heading: Balenciaga Store does not care about…

Author: colin brydon
Body:
Not sure where to start with this review. My son
 has just got his 2nd pair of balenciaga trainers.

The first pair were ‘triple s’without the air bubbles and within a few weeks the stitching at the side of the ankle had come away. Took them back to Harvey Nichols for a replacement, but unfortunately they didnt have the colour in stock. So got repaired and within a few months same again. The sales person at HN did say due to hand stitching this can and does happen. So stuck with a faulty pair. Great looking trainers but unfortunately not robust enough to last any time. £700 waste off money.

Bought a pair of sock boots (speed 2.0) on the 31st dec 21 COSTING NEARLY £700 a few days ago. My son has worn them twice. Once walking around for a few hours the other a walk to the car. These ones have individual rubber lettering to the top. Now two off the letters are hanging off. So back to flannels for a refund. 

What I will say with the hoodies they are good quality and have lasted really well.


WE WILL NOT BUY ANY MORE BALENCIAGA TRAINERS. A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY.
Heading: 2 pairs of trainers both faulty. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY.

Body:
Bought a pair of speed trainers, after wearing them for 15mins the right side of the shoe caused consistent pressure against my achilies heel. After taking a closer look there was a misalignment in the stitching at the back.
I took them to the Collins St store in June the sales asistant said we have to send them to the headoffice to assessment and should receive a response by friday.. one week turned into 3 months. during that time I made phone calls back to the store they said they still haven't heard anything from the headoffice and they are experiencing staff shortage hence the delay. 
Received a SMS not 'phone call' in September from the Store saying they got a response from HQ concluding they I have not idenitfied any irregualrities with the shoes. It was assessed and in her words "rejected" in the final stage of asessment. My only option was accept the shoes back wasn't entitled to a refund, exchange or credit for the time I waited. The Staff at this particular store were not transaparent with me from the start as to how long it'll take and didn't say they were going to be shipped off as she took photos of the shoes and said we'll send these as evidence. When they finally confirmed that they were going to sent the shoes back today after 2 weeks of not replying as the girl apparently was on annual leave; and rehashed the same thing the other girl said about the HQ assessment. Today they sent the shoes back. 
Will not buy from this brand ever again after spending $1,175 on these shoes not even offered a exchanged for the waiting game with these people, disgusting.

Author: Roxana Mobasheri
Body: Amazing service. There was a manufacturing fault on my Balenciaga speed trainers (logo was peeling off after only 4 weeks) so I took them back to the Mount Street store in Mayfair with the original receipt and box to discuss the problem. There was no fuss and they did not doubt my concerns and swiftly got me to fill out a form with the details. I left the shoes behind in their premises and was advised me it could take up to 8 weeks for them to run some checks with the manufacturer back in Italy but assured me they would be in contact. Several weeks later, (before the time I expected) I received an email from the Mount Street store manager to come in and pick up a replacement pair in my size that had been reserved for me. I am always greeted in a warm and friendly manner by the sales team and I was satisfied with the customer care that I received. The manager went above and beyond to ensure the problem was dealt with in a professional manner. Thank you for the impeccable service.
Heading: Amazing service

Author: Avani Kaur
Body:
NEVER EVER BUY FROM THE STORE. I was served by Sihem in the London flagship store before lockdown. The most unhelpful, curt and arrogant staff I have ever come across. Always buy your goods from Selfridges and Harrods they will let you return their goods. The Balenciaga staff never told me I couldn’t return my goods if I had an issue (it’s not very hard to speak up and say this to customers by the way it just requires simple communication skills which you should have learnt at school). I went to return my brand new unworn triple s sneakers the day after I bought them because they were too heavy and they said no. Bit late after I spent £700 on them. Trust me I buy luxury goods often but ALWAYS use department stores such as Selfridges as they accept returns and treat you nicely as everyone should be. Spending money doesn’t ever  mean guaranteed quality. But this awful situation worked out for me as I sold them for £1000 on StockX so a blessing in disguise after dealing with such awful staff. Why they treat people like this I will never understand. What on earth have customers ever said to you for you to be so arrogant and stuck up, it’s actually humorous to see people behave in this manner as adults.
Children know better. I’m not even writing this review as an annoyed customer who didn’t get a refund (which I didn’t) I resold mine but I’m writing this to tell you all don’t just ignore my review, trust me Gucci, Dior etc treat customers much better. Balenciaga staff are awful to deal with and clearly don’t remember you should treat people with respect if you want to be treated likewise. If you don’t want to be in a horrific situation, listen to me and use department stores.
Heading: NEVER EVER BUY FROM THE STORE

I pre-ordered a pair of black logo speed trainers from Luisaviaroma in December 2017 which Balenciaga promised to have it delivered by mid Feb 2018.

It's totally not Lujsiviaroma fault I suppose the only fault is that they should not accept payment first. I've been in constant communication with Luisaviaroma on the delivery date but according to them Balenciaga has not replied them on a confirmed delivery date at all.  

Luisaviaroma customer service is superb. They replied my email on time and they would accept my cancellation on the pre-order. But I love the shoes so much that I'm willing to wait a bit more... 

My point is if Balenciaga could not fulfil then don't promise and don't sell. 

I saw Barneys and  Saks also doing pre-orders during December 2017 too. I'm just wondering whether they have been fulfilled? ???

This is so disappointing. Such a great company , great products but the  customer service and management is low class.

Author: anonym
Body:
I am extremely disappointed that Balenciaga continues to work with UPS, a company that has proven to be completely incompetent. For three days, my urgent order has not been delivered, and now even further delays have occurred.

Today, when the courier finally arrived, he refused to accept cash payment because the card machine didn’t work. Despite my urgency, he simply walked away without delivering my package.

I contacted customer service three times, and two agents assured me that my package would arrive today. However, a third agent suddenly claimed nothing could be done and even refused to connect me with a supervisor or provide a complaint email. She then hung up on me.

I find it outrageous that Balenciaga entrusts its deliveries to a company that operates in such an unprofessional manner. I have lost all trust in ordering from you because UPS is damaging your brand’s reputation. If a luxury brand cannot guarantee a reliable shipping service, what’s the point of selling "exclusive" products?

This experience has convinced me to never order from Balenciaga again. You can keep your products—I will take my business elsewhere. I strongly urge you to reconsider your partnership with UPS before more customers are lost due to their incompetence and lack of accountability.
Heading: I am extremely disappointed that…

After sending customer service a dozen more photos that were asked for (for what reason, I don’t know), they finally said on October 19th that “if the repair will further compromise the item our repair center will not allow it.  The logo cannot be re-glued onto the shoe.” Well, two independent shoe repair services have told me that my issue is easily fixed, so it seems to me that Balenciaga simply is unwilling to stand behind their product and are perhaps more concerned about preserving their profit margins than behaving like a luxury brand. Author: maggie liu
Body:
I have always been a fan of Balenciaga, but I'm seriously questioning their quality now. My husband bought a pair of their Speed Sock shoes, and after just over a year, the sole started coming off on one of them, and they began squeaking when he walked. It’s pretty embarrassing. When he contacted their customer service, they simply directed him back to the store where he made the purchase. 

When he went to the store, the response was shocking. The store manager, Duy Tring, at the Valley Fair location in San Jose, California, basically told him that it’s normal for the shoes to wear out if they’re worn frequently and then subtly dismissed him without offering any real help. To make matters worse, another sales associate blatantly ignored him when he asked for further assistance and instead attended to a new customer who had just walked in. It was clear they had no interest in resolving the issue.
Heading: Questionable quality and bad post purchase service

Author: Michael
Body:
Where do I start! 

I ordered a €750 pair of runners as a gift a few weeks ago. From the off it was a disaster.

Firstly, Balenciaga (through their faulty website) took my money without making the order. This took 2 WEEKS to fix, they couldn’t find the order on their side. Eventually I had to involved my bank to fix the situation. 

Some of the staff where horrendous to deal with, rude and obnoxious to the paying customer. Talking down to me constantly and trying to push blame onto myself when it was their system all along. 

After the 2 weeks I was refunded and provided with a ‘next day’ delivery voucher for my troubles. The thing is, ‘next day’ delivery to Balenciaga means over a week!! Still have not received the trainers I ordered weeks ago. 

I rang customer service again to try and sort the situation out. They told me it’s my fault, I ordered the shoes at 4pm instead of 3pm so the next day delivery doesn’t count (I’m not even joking here!!!!). 

I asked for the order to be cancelled which I was told will take probably 2 weeks between the shipment being returned and then getting the funds back and as it’s now close to Christmas I begrudgingly went ahead with the order.

Really liked Balenciaga as a brand prior to this, will NEVER buy a stitch from them again & advise everyone to do the same.
Heading: The absolute worst shopping experience I ever had on every leve

Body: Love the speed socks!! So comfy and stylish !! Did go back and forth for quite some time on the right shoe size to choose. As I’m always in between sizes and they do not offer half sizes in these. I ordered both a 5 and 6. I am a men’s / boys size 4, so I was just really torn on the correct fit. It’s all about how you want them to fit really ,5 [35] being snug and a 6 [36] being more spacious. I ended up keeping the 5 thankfully because they do fit very well and stretch a bit so they don’t feel so snug. Literally feel like socks.  If I would have kept a 6 I think I would have been swimming in them. Customer service was always there when I needed them , also returns on the size I decided not to keep and then others bought was very easy with no issues. I’ve had these for a couple months now , I just hope I’m one of the lucky ones and they last! Other reviews really help the good and the bad. But so far for me mine has been a good experience.
Heading: Love the speed socks!

Author: Klrsten Ekrub
Body: I confirmed full details of my online purchase to Balenciaga at the beginning of September.  The product purchased I don’t believe is acceptable as the sole has started coming away from the material at the front. And around the sides of the shoe you can see what appears to be some kind of sealant. I have followed the procedure suggested by Balenciaga by putting my concern in writing. I received a response requesting pictures. I provided pictures the same day and waited 10 days without a response. I chased this up again, to be told the pictures were not clear enough. I then sent numerous further pictures the same day (9th October) to which I still have not received any update. I have chased this up twice since the 9th but have not been acknowledged. I have since asked for my complaint to be escalated but as expected have not received a response. I have purchased many times from Balenciaga without issue, which leads me to believe this particular purchase is faulty and not up to standard, however the customer service is extremely poor and not what I would expect from a designer of this profile.
Heading: Faulty product and poor customer service.

Author: Anonymous
Body: I returned a complete order within the return policy guidelines and used all of the original packaging and supplied pre-paid Balenciaga UPS return label.  When they processed the return, the amount was incorrect.  I contacted them and customer service (Ana) states that I did not return one item in the order, which is COMPLETELY FALSE.  I asked them to conduct an internal investigation and/or with UPS.  I have no reason to believe they conducted an internal investigation and they wanted me to contact UPS, even though I cannot, since I am not the account holder of the UPS label (Balenciaga is).  They have deflected any responsibility and have not been helpful in any way.  I am now noticing in other reviews that other people have had similar issues.  Needless to say, Balenciaga needs to straighten these issues out with their customers, if they plan on keeping business.  I have also filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau, so that something is done about their ill behavior towards customers.
Heading: Dishonest Customer Service, Return Item Mysteriously Missing

Author: Lauren
Body: I was extremely apprehensive about ordering direct from the website due to the number of negative reviews on here, however decided to go for it. Ordered on 24/03/2021 shoes arrived 26/03/2021, extremely speedy service despite the website saying to expect delays due to brexit (I’m in Scotland). Unfortunately the shoes were too small, I accidentally ordered 2 sizes down from my usual size instead of the recommended 1 size down. Again, I was apprehensive about returning. Organising the return through the Balenciaga website was extremely easy, the difficult part was navigating the DHL website. After some time I figured out I had to use the Waybill number from the prepaid returns label to organise my pick up on the DHL Express website. I started the return process on 31/03/2021 - DHL collected my shoes the same afternoon and the next day (today 01/04/2021) my refund has been received by Balenciaga and is in process at the bank - really pleased with the whole service and would definitely order direct from the website again!
Heading: Please read if your nervous about ordering direct from the website based on bad reviews!!!

I found out today that I will be receiving them on the 29/10, hrs later it’s pushed even further 30/10 which by then I won’t be in the state to receive them or wear them. So I have just basically thrown $1245 in the bin and no shoes to wear to an event. Every label I have ever purchased from sends the item right away and I received it within 3-4 days. Thank you Belanciaga for being now my most hated label. I’ll be sure to spread the word of hate. DISGUSTING CUSTOMER SERVICE, DISGUSTING POSTAGE SERVICE, DISGUSTING WAY OF RUNNING A MULTI MILLION DOLLAR HIGH END LABEL.

Author: PYildiz
Body: I purchased Classic City S handbag from Selfridges London in the beginning of January 2019. However, after 3-4 months, tassels were broken and separated in addition to wear on piping, which is not exposed to any friction. As I live in a different country I sent an email to Balenciaga and Selfridges with all relevant photos. But the store requested delivery of the handbag. I visited the Balenciaga at Selfridges at the end of October and showed the handbag. The staff took the photos to be sent to the technical staff. Although I asked why delivery of the handbag was requested 5 months ago despite the fact that photos were sufficient for inspection which I already submitted, I could not get any answer. I visited the store again 2 weeks later as I did not get any response where I saw that my complaint was not submitted to the technical department!!! Same procedures applied again; photos were taken, a report was arranged etc. In each communication, I requested exchange as that was obvious quality problem. Of course, this request was not accepted based on the justification that lampskin is delicate and this wear is normal!! I spent lots of time both for writing to Balenciaga and visiting Selfridges store to get an answer to my questions. Finally, in the beginning of December, I received an email from Selfridges stating the technical staff accepted to apply FREE repair. Although what I experience is obvious quality problem, Balenciaga is doing a favor as if the problem has arisen due to my mistake!! In order to stop this conversation, I accepted their offer on 5th of December 2019. It is 20th of January and repair process has not completed yet. I haven't seen such a terrible aftersale service before.
Heading: Poor aftersale service
